patthana16.53:1.1_1: dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Ārammaṇe tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi,
patthana16.53:2.1: Anidassanasappaṭighaṁ anidassanaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanasappaṭigho naanidassano dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā nava, adhipatiyā nava …pe… avigate nava.
